website_summaries.verdict: These award-winning wipes have a soft, luxurious texture and contain natural, non-irritating ingredients to care for even the most sensitive skin.
pros: Organic wood pulp construction is free of plastic and fully biodegradable
Ph balanced, hypoallergenic, and dermatologically approved for sensitive skin
Made by a company that’s as passionate about caring for sensitive skin as they are about protecting the environment
cons: Getting a single wipe out of the package can be tricky

customer_reviews.title: Finally a wet wipe that doesn't contain plastic
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find a wet wipe that is made entirely from plant fibers with no plastic materials added, so that it is fully biodegradable. I still don't flush them, but at least I'm happy about not putting a ton of plastic into the landfill. Now, I just wish I knew the packaging itself was recyclable. I also appreciate that they make a fragrance free option. The only negative thing I would say is that the top flap doesn't stick very well and sometimes comes off. I just solve this problem by flipping the package upside down so that it stays closed and sealed up between use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: I love almost everything about it
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes. I have tried many different eco-friendly, non toxic, all natural wipes and these were my favorite. I did like one other brand just as much but they were almost twice as expensive so I went with this one. My only complaint is that the wipes don't always pull out easily. As with most wipes, I find myself grabbing a clump and violently shaking the packaging so I can get one out, with one hand, while holding the babies legs with the other.
customer_reviews.author: dog lover

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Wipes
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these wipes for almost 2 years. Originally we bought these and Water Wipes to see which we preferred for our new baby. The Kinder By Nature Wipes were thicker and stayed moist longer. Both had a natural/neutral smell which was also nice. Some "natural" wipes smell gross or have an added fragrance. Not what you want as a new Mom with a sensitive nose. These are more expensive than the average baby wipe but I believe they are worth the extra money. You can easily distinguish the ingredients and have peace of mind knowing what you are using on your baby's skin. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible to dispense, but nice wipes
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these wipes! HATE getting them out of the packaging. They seem to stick to each other so much that I often pull multiple wipes out at once and find it very annoying to shake them apart in the middle of a diaper change. I bought them for their natural ingredients so I can get over the inconvenience. But I still wish they were better to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These wipes came highly recommend from crunchy Mamas. I love that there are no toxic ingredients, however the wipes are subpar. They are extremely rough and very thin. Like crappy toilet paper thin. I hate using them on my baby's bum. I bought the 12 pack and wish I would have bought the single pack to try first instead of wasting $40. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shantel H.

customer_reviews.title: Poor wipe removal but clean ingredients
customer_reviews.text: These are the cleanest ingredients I’ve found. The downside of these is they do not come out of the package well. You pull one and they stay attached to others. When you’re changing a baby this can be EXCEPTIONALLY annoying. So if you get these prep your wipes before beginning to change the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: New material, beware! Thin, flimsy, useless.
customer_reviews.text: New material for wipes is terrible! I have been using these wipes for 4 years. In my most recent purchase a few weeks ago, I noticed the packaging was newly designed, however was surprised to find that the wipes were too. These new ones are flimsy, thin and have NO structure. When wiping anything, they roll up, forming a thin cigarette like shape. Absolutely useless now and definitely not worth the cost. Am now on the hunt for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Could be so much better. Very dry, and rough. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these trying to find some good and as close to natural and water as I can wipes since my husband and I both work and I’m not able to add homemade water wipes to my list of things to do. I wasn’t really impressed. The wipes were pretty rough, scratchy, and dry even though we use a wipes warmer we fill with water. My son did get a rash while using these as well, but I definitely can’t pin point that this was the reason. I do like that they are safer, but I just feel like there’s so much that needs to be improved on. I also feel they are very overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: TJCarr

customer_reviews.title: Best baby wipes
customer_reviews.text: I had searched high and low trying to find baby wipes without questionable, possibly toxic ingredients. I discovered Jackson Reece wipes on Amazon over 3 years ago and have been using them on my kids ever since. I've gotten both unscented and the herbal scent and like the way both smell. They don't irritate my little one's bums, are environmentally-friendly, and get the job done. I am so thankful to Jackson Reece for making these wipes and will continue to use them as long as I use baby wipes.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Safe, non-toxic ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate a company finally cares about the ingredients we are wiping on our kids butts, seriously. Too many companies out there are putting toxins in baby wipes - it's sickening. That being said, it doesn't come without paying a bit more for SAFE, non-toxic wipes. Yes, these are expensive. I wish I could afford them every time I needed wipes. And there is no other wipe I feel comfortable using on my baby than this one. The price point is the only bummer, but it's understandable - you can't have your cake and eat it, too, ya know.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Safe.  Effective.  Rash-free.
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes! We were looking for something simple and safe (but effective) for our newborn. Water wipes were too wet and didn’t have enough texture to “clean.” And so many other just stunk. These WORK, they have a very light, clean scent and, most importantly, my baby is almost 10 weeks and rash free. I will also add that for those who are complaining about the packaging and dispensing - it’s true, the packets don’t close well and come out in clumps. However, we easily rectified that by purchasing an OXO wipe dispenser. Totally worth it. I rip open two packs, load it up and we’re good to go. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Julesy

customer_reviews.title: Left burn on baby’s skin
customer_reviews.text: I used these wipes for a while on my first born with no issue except that they are thin and don’t pull out of the package well. But for some reason my second son has a terrible reaction to them. They completely burned his skin. Didnt think it could possibly be the wipes but i mistakenly used them again 1 time after a month of using something else and he immediately had another bad burn everywhere i wiped him. No idea what is in these that is causing the problem and i still use them on my eldest without issue, but when this package runs out i won’t be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Ten Eyck

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes
customer_reviews.text: I have been so pleased to find so many biodegradable wipes on the market! These wipes perform well, are not heavily scented, and do not irritate my baby’s skin. They are sealed with a self-stick plastic that comes loose after opening a few times, which can frustrate some people, but I usually keep packaged wipes in a ziploc (I’ve experienced too many bags wet from leaking wipes of many brands In the past). They also arrived super fast, unlike many other necessities during these quarantimes.
customer_reviews.author: neverdone

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Personal Cleansing
customer_reviews.text: There are no babies in our household, but I wanted to find a personal wipe that was affordable and ecologically more responsible (biodegradable and compostable). These are nice strong wipes and they have not caused any irritation on sensitive skin. While there is no added fragrance, their natural scent still reminds me of baby wipes and I'm not a huge fan of that, but overall I'm still happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Stars

customer_reviews.title: A great healthy and sustainable option
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wipe that would be biodegradable (plastic free ) and also avoid chemical additives. I’m surprised there aren’t more options like this. I was happy to find these, and they’re relatively affordable! Nice mild scent and we’ve had no problems with skin reactions. We use these mostly when on the go or dealing with big masses that are cloth wipes can’t handle. One complaint is that the wipes are very difficult to separate, you really need to be able to grab one quickly and one handed when your wrist deep in a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Maruca

customer_reviews.title: Love these British wet wipes
customer_reviews.text: Whenever we try going back to any other American brand wipes aside from the brand “water wipes” my daughter gets a rash. That includes every natural brand you can think of that they sell in the health food stores and we live in a big city. These are worth the price for us and my daughter always tells me if we are running low as she hates just TP. The scented version is equally nice too though I think the quantities may be different and since we go through them we buy the most possible. They are thick and one wipe goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

customer_reviews.title: Love the ingredients, room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Our son has sensitive skin so I was on the hunt for cleaner wipes. Our local grocery stores and big box stores don't have the biggest selection so I started my search here. Pros: cleaner ingredients didn't irritate his newborn skin nice packaging. I'm a sucker for packaging Cons: Not "wet" enough for messy poos The wipes all stick together so the one hand grab is impossible Not as soft as other brands Overall, I love the ingredients, but need a wetter and easier to use wipe for everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Texachusetts

customer_reviews.title: YEEESSSSSSS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t ask for a better wipe. The unscented Jackson Reece wipe is the ONLY one on the market (yes, I think I’ve pretty much tried them all) that does not break out my child’s face. (?!). Yes, of course I use them mostly for diaper changes. But when we are out and the face gets a little grimy, I like to clean her up with a wet wipe. This one is it! While it is not super plush and luxurious, it is soft, effective on all types of ‘jobs’, safe, no harsh chemicals, and biodegradable: what more can you ask for?!!
customer_reviews.author: JBsetfree

customer_reviews.title: The best wipes you can get
customer_reviews.text: I buy these by the case every 2 weeks. They are superior to wet wipes in my opinion. They are soft and my 17 month old daughter has never had a rash. They aren’t slick however like wet wipes which makes changing a dirty diaper much easier. They don’t contain chemicals that I try to keep off of my baby. So we love these.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Worth it...
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are worth it. More expensive than leading popular brands but, those other companies should take note. A child's skin is very delicate. These are far less toxic in terms of less ingredients being used and the companies commitment to using endocrine free and carcinogenic free chemicals. I was able to research the ingredients and easily understand what the product was made of.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend. Wanted to love
customer_reviews.text: I’m shocked at how many great reviews there are on these! Yes, ingredient wise, they’re one of the best. But they are very thin, not soft at all and the sticker top of the wipes is a really poor design. I really wanted to love these due to the ingredients but my husband made me promise to never buy these again. There are much better, more effective and still non toxic wipes out there.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients. Awful to get out of the packet!
customer_reviews.text: It is nice that they provide a non toxic alternative, though they are a major pain in the butt to use. You often only have one hand to use, so when you pull out a while you end up with half the bag as they don’t tear away from one another. I would also prefer to use more smaller wipes than fewer large ones. Don’t always need a full wipe. I would understand the price point more if their use was actually user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: We won't wipe our son with anything but chemical free. These are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: The JR wipes don't have any of the crap that scares us - chemicals and scents, it just doesn't make sense to touch his skin with anything fake. Plus they are biodegradable and that seems the responsible thing to do these days. They don't smell, no residue, and very soft. Keep the tab over the hole on the bag so they don't start to dry. We use on his face and his business. Highly recommend (PS - also not made in China if matters to you as it does to us).
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpack901

customer_reviews.title: Best environmentally friendly wipes!
customer_reviews.text: Best wipes ever! I use these to wipe my dog's paws after walks. After scouring reviews and researching I found that these are the best, non-toxic and environmentally friendly wipes (only the best for my babies)! Could be difficult sometimes to pull out from the box, but it isn't bothering me in any way. It's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: uglydance

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes, sucky packet
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are great - I like that they are all natural ingredients and don't contain plastic. They are also the right level of wetness and clean well. However the packet is terrible!! The plastic seal falls off almost right away, especially when stored in a bag, so you're left with your wipes exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Stack

customer_reviews.title: I like that these are one of the most eco wipes ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are one of the most eco wipes out there in market and I feel good using them on my babies however, these feel kinda hard and I would use a couple more wipes than some other brands I've tried. Kinda expensive if you add up all the extra wipes you would use.
customer_reviews.author: carlita611

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable packaging!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite wipes and we've used these ever since my child's birth. I just got a new box of wipes in the mail today from UPS and this is how it came.... unacceptable! I don't know if this was a returned box or if someone tampered with the wipes. I wouldn't risk using this particular box on my child!
customer_reviews.author: 2Chronicles7:14

customer_reviews.title: For more than just babies..
customer_reviews.text: These are the 4th "natural" wipes I've tried, and they are the best. The right wetness and no scent. I will probably continue to order them after we are done with potty training to use as personal "freshen up" wipes.
customer_reviews.author: M. G-W

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We are using these wipes for our second baby now and are very happy with them. Definitely recommend them. They never tear or smelly funny. They work as they should without feeling guilty that we are using a non biodegradable product.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra & Tom

customer_reviews.title: These wipes are absolutely AMAZING. I tried every wipe there is on the ...
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are absolutely AMAZING. I tried every wipe there is on the market and didn't find anything that wasn't filled with harmful chemicals and that really worked for my daughter's sensitive skin. When I stumbled upon these wipes it was the best thing ever. I recommend them to everyone I know. They clean little baby bits really well without using harsh chemicals and irritating the skin. Plus they don't have any kind of noxious smell. I LOVE these wipes and they are worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used to like water wipes but they get moldy in the dispenser ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of baby wipes and this is the most natural with the fewest ingredients. It doesn't leave a residue, doesn't get moldy and the wipe is big enough that I can get away with only using 2 for "muddy" types of messes ;). I used to like water wipes but they get moldy in the dispenser too quickly. One case lasts me about 8-10 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Used to love these wipes until I received my most recent orders with almost all individual wipes packages open. I ordered 2 boxes and both were the same. It’s just a tab that came off and all the wipes would have dried out before I could use them. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work well!
customer_reviews.text: These are soft but also strong. Each square is a bit small, but that is also nice because you don’t always need a huge sheet for every diaper change. I am a huge fan of how baby and earth friendly they are!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My son was having redness from other wipes (honest, Huggies naturals, cloth wipes that I just got wet right before a change (maybe too abrasive?)) but these caused no irritation and his redness was cleared up in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Nuner Fam

customer_reviews.title: love these natural and environmentally-friendly wipes
customer_reviews.text: theses wipes are exactly what i was looking for! work great- prefer these wipes to all of the 'big name brand' ones i've tried. also a great price, especially compared to some of the other 'natural' brands. love how they are environmentally conscious and biodegradable. i am ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Scent free, eco friendly and sensitive!
customer_reviews.text: My baby has super sensitive skin and we were using water wipes but they were too wet and ended up causing him to get more rashes. These are excellent quality, eco friendly and perfect for sensitive skin! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ben k

customer_reviews.title: Stop with this question.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is an 8 on a scale one to 10. The package is a 4. Reason is the sticky closure comes Off way to easily. So I had to add tape to keep it closed.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Parks

customer_reviews.title: Best toxin free wipes out there!
customer_reviews.text: I am super impressed with these wipes! They are soft and have the perfect amount of moisture to them. I LOVE that they are free of toxins. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Especially for babies with sensitive skin. We started with Water Wipes brand and they were so wet and left moisture all over the place. Then we tried Huggies Natural wipes and those made our daughters skin break out. These wipes are the perfect balance.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Simonetti

customer_reviews.title: Packaging Could Use Some Improvement
customer_reviews.text: We love the product itself, but the packaging doesn't seal well and the flap comes off very easily. Also, the package is rather small. I wish they sold these in larger bags with the hard lid like some other competing brands.
customer_reviews.author: BAR

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle although difficult to get out of package.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Have used these for months and they have never giving my babies bum a rash. The only complaint would be that they are difficult to remove one at a time. They want to bunch together and you have to push them back in. The closure sticker loves to come off but so far I've never had a pack dry up with out it. Their pricey but so worth it when it comes to health of my babe.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Otto

customer_reviews.title: Using this wipe religiously, worth it if you want the best for your baby
customer_reviews.text: Tried so many different kinds of wipes and was frustrated because all of them caused my baby to break out in rashes. We found out about this from Gimme the Good Stuff and we are so happy to have tried it out! We will never go back now. It is more expensive than the mainstream ones out there like Huggies and Pampers but my baby's skin says it all -- worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: nbecerra

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find, better for the body and environment product. Expensive but you're getting what you pay for. I did have a problem with packaging ruining the product, but Jackson Reece remedied it right away. And you can not expect more than that from any seller. Will be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent baby wipes
customer_reviews.text: These are about the only wipes we've used on our son. They're wonderful. They hold up really well with messes, are wet--but not TOO wet, and scent free. Baby has super sensitive skin and these have never given him a problem. We also LOVE that they're biodegradable, compostable, and plastic free. LOVE these wipes.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Guess what? I love these wipes!
customer_reviews.text: Considering the chemicals and junky stuff other wipes have, I naturally chose these! I love them because they do the job without being too harsh! Have you ever swiped your face with a big brand wipe? Oweeee!! When I wipe my face with these, no problem!! Worth every penny and last a long time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Love this product and almost use nothing else
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and almost use nothing else. My daughter has eczema and sensitive skin; and these wipes have been gentle on bottom and other areas. The packaging is frustrating, tears often.
customer_reviews.author: purpleDW

customer_reviews.title: When seventh generation wipes didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Baby was sensitive to seventh generation wipes and got a rash. Started using these and her bum is all clear! I use earth Mamá bottom balm as well and the pair is perfect for my baby’s skin.
customer_reviews.author: Quiche

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients listed on the company website are what attracted me to these wipes but they differ from what’s on the package. I find the scent to be chemical-like and the wipes have a soapy feel. I’ll be going back to bets and emy wipes for just a little bit higher cost per wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes. Our daughter has sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes. Our daughter has sensitive skin. We have tried all kinds of wipes, including Honest Conpany and these are the only ones that don’t irratate her skin.
customer_reviews.author: Todd T.

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes but hard to get out with one hand
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle wipes, love that they are safe for face, but I have to agree with other reviews that getting a single wipe out of the container is sometimes quite frustrating- you need two hands, and violently shaking to get one wipe free sadly doesn't always do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Love these wipes!
customer_reviews.text: Fixed my babies diaper rash almost immediately. I feel so bad I was using toxic wipes on it before! Never going back, totally worth the money for my babies comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Krissi

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I won’t say it’s a poorly made product considering it gets the job done and is earth friendly, but based on other products, this is the least luxurious feeling wipe I’ve used. Again, not a bad product, just very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not come in original packaging
customer_reviews.text: The wipes did not come in the usual packaging. They came in a ripped up plastic bag. This is concerning for baby items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product as advertised and will do the intended job.
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes. Durable, not too wet, and scent isn't' too powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: Used these on my newborn! no rashes so no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Only think I don’t like is the texture a bit. Just wish it was incredible soft for babies bottoms !
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: These work great I just don’t like the feel of them. I wish they were thicker. I love that they are biodegradable. I wish the packaging was too.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget W

customer_reviews.title: I love these wipes
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes. They are great for sensitive skin and in a nice compact package. The only thing I wish they would change is the closure. Would love it if it were a hard plastic opening instead.
customer_reviews.author: Colby R Klein

customer_reviews.title: No Harmful Chemicals
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been using these wipes since the birth of our child. We chose them because of quality ingredients and the lack of a scent. The wipes are strong and clean well. It's been 14 months and we haven't had any irritated skin. My only minor complaint is the wipes are sometimes difficult to get out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: T. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Okay wipes, came out in clumps
customer_reviews.text: These were okay wipes, but they were too thin, and when I would try to pull one wipe out, a whole clump would come out, so then I would have to stuff the extra back in, that was rather annoying.
customer_reviews.author: NoblesJ

customer_reviews.title: ... was looking for a wipe that was made of good stuff without all the chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wipe that was made of good stuff without all the chemicals. These are great, just the right amount of moisture and textured just enough!
customer_reviews.author: AshleyA

customer_reviews.title: Great product, could use less packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love these but I hate the packaging. The whole reason I buy biodegradable is for less waste. I wish they weren't divided into so many packages. I love that these are shipped in the actual box but they would be perfect if they were bundled by the hundreds and not the tens.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Anderson

customer_reviews.title: All Natural.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the feel, liked that it is biodegradable and flushable. Of course, like that there are NO chemicals. The only thing...a little small in size. Only reason I am not giving it a five star. But would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis S. Russo DC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive newborns
customer_reviews.text: These are the only wipes that my daughter didn’t react to. Pricey but so worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tmoffatt

customer_reviews.title: User unfriendly
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that I'll buy this again with a urine like scent and continuous jamming of the wipes when pulling out.
customer_reviews.author: khaled d.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Love! The only wipes I will use for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: LTD

customer_reviews.title: Great wipe but they stick together!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these wipes are low in chemicals but they are very difficult to get apart. They stick together badly!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are extraordinary!! The packaging sucks they dry out very easily bc there is just the sticky plastic to close them and it falls off right away, but that is easily fixed, but I do wish they offered a pop top package
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was getting terrible diaper rashes and we finally figured out it was ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was getting terrible diaper rashes and we finally figured out it was from the chemicals in her wipes. We switched to these and have not had any issues. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They seem thin, and they're hard to get out ...
customer_reviews.text: They seem thin, and they're hard to get out and keep moist. The sticker tab that closes it gets in the way and falls off long before the pack is empty. They work, but I prefer Seventh Generation over these.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Spendy but they are great wipes. Strong, thick and no scent. Love that they are biodegradable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas H.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not smell very well and can't purchase travel sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Do not use any other baby wipe brand!!
customer_reviews.text: Best non toxic baby wipes hands down, they’re the only ones i use on my baby
customer_reviews.author: Nekita

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients.  Very moist.  But difficult to get out of package
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are really moist which is great. And you cant beat the ingredients. The only downfall is its really difficult to get one wipe out at a time with one hand as they all stick together. The packaging could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Small but Good!
customer_reviews.text: Love that these wipes are natural and chemical free! Dislike how they stick together and on the smaller side. BUT I compromise my dislikes for peace of mind. I’ll continue to order. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but shipping costs are too much
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes and have been using them for the past 16 months. However, I had to find another wipe as the shipping costs make these wipes too darn expensive. Hence my 3 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: The best. Baby now 20 mos old and never a hint of diaper rash. It is difficult to pull just one out of the package but I just stuff the extras back in. I usually keep the packet in a ziploc bag (I don't bother to zip it shut) since it doesn't seal shut that well.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bloggs

customer_reviews.title: Good Wipes
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes for the family - a bit expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I was a long-time user of Water Baby Wipes. At one point I wanted to see if there are other natural, chemical-free baby wipes. I read some good reviews about these wipes and decided to give it a try. I ordered the unscenyed ones. As soon as I opened the first package, a very strong chemical smell hit my nose. I still tried to use them on my 2-year-old and didn’t like them at all. They were unpleasant on the skin and still had a strong chemical smell after wiping. Didn’t like them at all
customer_reviews.author: Masha Meliuk

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Wipes There Is!
customer_reviews.text: Best baby wipe there is! The sheets is larger then most wipes and great on sensitive skins. The unscented wipes feels clean and refresh without the any smell!
customer_reviews.author: t700

customer_reviews.title: My daughter has sensitive skin and these are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very natural, biodegradable wipes. My daughter has sensitive skin and these are perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wipes, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I like Jackson Reece because are the best wipes for my baby . Good quality, better than others brand that I tried .
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great clean wipe, texture/surface could be better
customer_reviews.text: A little thinner than expected/no texture to them. However they are very non irritating and Baby seems to do well with them. Like the ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Rkagan

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this item
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product will definitely purchase again, shipping was timely thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Just wish the tab to keep them closed was better, but we love these and will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick P.

customer_reviews.title: Not buying again
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these wipes, but my daughter got a bad rash from it. But hey, some babies are just more sensitive than others. I've resorted to using cloth wipes now. Sadly, I bought the bulk package and have tons leftover.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Kieu

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the most natural wipes I could find. They seem to work well.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: gosh I LOVE THESE! only wipes that I will buy!

customer_reviews.title: BEST WIPES EVER
customer_reviews.text: Used to be a waterwipes lover but these are amazing!!!

customer_reviews.title: These are great wipes. They don’t have a strange odor like ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great wipes. They don’t have a strange odor like others, they do a great job and they are compostable! They work well for babies with sensitive skin. Highly recommended

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my all-time favorite wipes. No bad stuff in them.

customer_reviews.text: Burning sensation on skin. Upset that i used these on my baby.

customer_reviews.text: These are the only wipes I will use on my baby ! Completely and totally nontoxic !

customer_reviews.text: They are what my daughter uses for her 3 month old and they're great and fregrance feee
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They do the job...gave it 4 stars due to after smell...i tried both herbal and unscented.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mom Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I spent A LOT of time researching wipes and trying to find the perfect combination of non-toxic and ease of use. When my son was first born, I bought Water Wipes, but found them to be too thin for my liking. The Kinder By Nature wipes are far superior in this regard, however, my one complaint is that the wipes tend to stick together when pulling them out of the package - this results in a big clump of wipes coming out at once. While this isn't enough the stop me from using the product, it is something that is a small annoyance during diaper changes.
customer_reviews.author: RedwoodMom

customer_reviews.title: My box was missing one pack of wipes. Description ...
customer_reviews.text: My box was missing one pack of wipes. Description said there should be 12 packs and I only received 11!! Please advise
customer_reviews.author: Pawel Fijalkowski

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love that these wipes are safer than other wipes for my baby. It wipes well, usually 1 is enough to do the job, no scent, and stays moist. HOWEVER the packaging is awful. There is no way to pull a single wipe at a time with one hand. I usually have to pull out a whole stack, use two hands to separate 1 wipe from that stack, and then somehow shove the rest back into the small hole at the top of the package to prevent the rest of the wipe from drying out. It's a total pain.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

product_meta.title: Kinder by Nature Water-Based Baby Wipes - 100% Biodegradable & Compostable, 224 Count (4 Packs of 56) - 99% Water, 0% Plastic
feature_bullets: WATER-BASED FORMULA - Water based formula is created for those who wish to have the simplest ingredients available. Our water based contains 99% water and 1% plant derived extracts
HYPOALLERGENIC - Suitable for children with eczema and sensitive skin
BIO-DEGRADABLE - Cloth is 100% biodegradable and compostable in just 60 days
